name: hyper-fang
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Attacks with sharp fangs. May cause flinching.
flavor_text.emerald: Attacks with sharp fangs. May cause flinching.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The foe is attacked with sharp fangs. It may make the foe flinch.
